panels.title: Side Car Summary
Version Information
Total # of Aggregated Feeds + Provider Feeds

panels.description: Number of successful price updates that were fetched by WebSocket and API providers per second.
panels.title: Number of Prices Fetched / Sec in Range

panels.description: The number times per second that the side-car attempts to calculate a final price from all of the providers in range.
panels.title: Side Car Price Aggregation Tick Interval
Total Number of Attempted Price Calculations in Range

panels.description: This table is tracking the number of attempted price aggregations to the actual number of aggregations. So effectively this ratio tells us how often we were able to get a final aggregated price.
panels.title: Successful Price Update % in Range Graphed

panels.description: Percentage of successful price updates relative to the expected number of updates in range.
panels.title: Successful Price Update % in Range
Total Number of Successful Price Updates in Side Car in Range
Sidecar logs
Go Routines
Side Car Aggregated Prices

targets.expr: 100 * (avg_over_time(side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"}[5m]) - side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"} offset 5m) / side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"} offset 5m

100 * (avg_over_time(side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"}[1h]) - side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"} offset 1h) / side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"} offset 1h

100 * (avg_over_time(side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"}[6h]) - side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"} offset 6h) / side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"} offset 6h

100 * (avg_over_time(side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"}[24h]) - side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"} offset 24h) / side_car_aggregated_price{job=~"${job}", id=~"${id}"} offset 24h

panels.title: Price Change in Time Range for ${id}
${id} Market
Number of Available Provider Prices for ${id}
Side Car Provider Health

panels.description: Percentage of requests from sidecar to data provider that were successful in the time range of the dashboard
panels.title: Data Provider HTTP 2XX % in Range

panels.description: Percentage of web socket messages from sidecar to data provider that were successful handled in the time range of the dashboard.
panels.title: Data Provider Successful WebSocket Message Handling % in Range
Data Provider HTTP Status Code / sec
# of Successful Reads / Sec by Provider in Range
Median Round Trip Latency by API Provider
Median Latency between Message Receives by WebSocket Provider

panels.description: Percentage of reads that were successfully made on the underlying connection by the data provider in the range. Note that a lower percentage doesn't necessarily imply that the connection is bad - it could just mean that it has received fewer updates.
panels.title: Data Provider Successful WebSocket Connection Reads % in Range

panels.description: The percentage of successful writes made by web socket data providers in the range.
panels.title: Data Provider Successful WebSocket Connection Writes % in Range

panels.description: This metric tracks the total number of times a successful connection was created to the relevant providers.
panels.title: Total # of New WebSocket Connections in Range
# of Price Feeds for ${provider}

targets.expr: count((sum by (provider, id) (increase(side_car_health_check_provider_updates_total{job="${job}", success="true", provider=~"${provider}"}[$__range])) / sum by (provider, id) (increase(side_car_health_check_provider_updates_total{job="${job}", provider=~"${provider}", success=~"true|false"}[$__range]))) > 0.95)

panels.title: # of Price Feeds with > 95% Success Rate

panels.description: Percentage of how often we were able to successfully retrieve a price from a provider per market when expected.

targets.expr:
1 - (
    sum by (provider, id) 
    (increase(side_car_health_check_provider_updates_total{job="${job}", success="false", provider=~"${provider}"}[$__range])) 
    / 
    sum by (provider, id) 
    (increase(side_car_health_check_provider_updates_total{job="${job}", provider=~"${provider}", success=~"true|false"}[$__range]))
)

panels.title: Data Provider ${provider} Fetch Success % in Range

targets.expr:
(1 - (
    sum by (provider, id) 
    (increase(side_car_health_check_provider_updates_total{job="${job}", success="false", provider=~"${provider}"}[$__range])) 
    / 
    sum by (provider, id) 
    (increase(side_car_health_check_provider_updates_total{job="${job}", provider=~"${provider}", success=~"true|false"}[$__range]))
)) * 100

panels.title: Price Feed Success Rate
Detailed Side Car ${provider} Market Health
Solana Node Provider Health
Solana Node Provider Health

targets.expr: sum(rate(side_car_api_response_latency_sum{provider="raydium_api", job=~"${job}"}[5m])) by (le, endpoint) / sum(rate(side_car_api_response_latency_count{provider="raydium_api", job=~"${job}"}[5m])) by (le, endpoint)

panels.title: Solana Node Provider Latency
